meanings.definition: A person who hates or is averse to marriage.
meanings.sent1: The misogynist refused to attend his sister's wedding.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was a misogynist when he rejected every proposal.
meanings.sent3: The misogynist joked that he would rather wrestle a bear than get married.
meanings.sent4: Her father described him as a misogynist iceberg, cold and distant from the idea of marriage.
meanings.sent5: The image of the misogynist standing alone at the wedding, scowling, stuck in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: One who avoids or is opposed to the institution of marriage.
meanings.sent1: The community labeled him a misogynist for his anti-marriage stance.
meanings.sent2: As a misogynist, he believed marriage was a trap.
meanings.sent3: The misogynist claimed he was allergic to wedding rings, causing laughter among his friends.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as a misogynist fortress, impenetrable to the idea of marriage.
meanings.sent5: The image of the misogynist surrounded by wedding invitations, all unopened, was unforgettable.
